attributes.review: My grandma got this app and after having it for only one day she was found dead. When we found her she was holding her phone, not long after we found her we learned that before she died she had been using this app. Therefore this app killed my grandma. Overall I would like to say that this app is disgusting and disgraceful. I hope to see it taken down as it is so absolutely awful that it kills innocent old ladies.
attributes.title: Killed my grandma

attributes.review:
This app is horribly ran and set up. Everyone supporting it must be crazy because this man is racist. Official trump 2020 app is probably the worst app on here, and there’s no way it should stay. It brought cockroaches and many other bugs. It’s smells horrible and now I’m living in fear 🤧. He’s doubled national debt, created less jobs for Americans, and taken away health care for LGBTQ+
 Not only that, but when you launch the app HORRIBLE music is played and my ears are still recovering. DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD.

attributes.review: the story starts when i went to download the app, it took a solid 10 hours to download!! which was odd because i have super cool speedy wifi. all i was trying to do it support president 🍊 who totally made american great again!! when i opened the app it showed me a picture of my dead grandma!! spooky right? my grandma was head over heels in love with trump. she even fought one of those cringe tikker toker liberals to prove her love for him!!! after it stopped showing the picture of my grandma, it started playing this creepy music!! which attracted these birds. at first i thought they were just normal birds, but when i looked closer- i saw they were spies!! the birds work for the bourgeoisie!! don’t download this app if you don’t want to be spied on!!
attributes.title: horrible!!🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: So as an avid trump supporter, I downloaded this app with joy! Little did I realize what everyone was telling me was true. Even Sleepy Joe would do better than this! Shortly after downloading it, I got texts in Chinese from random numbers, and I even got scam callers! I didn’t know what was happening at first, but my granddaughter told me Trump sold my information! I am furious and heartbroken that he would do such a thing to his loyal supporters just for a few bank. TRUMP 2020 BUT IN JAIL!🧚🏽‍♀️✨
attributes.title: HORRIBLE SPYWARE APP🦋✨

attributes.review: Despite the fact that it took me HOURS to upload, it also changes all of the photos in my phone, AND my backgrounds into some weird picture of a man with a very orange face..... I just wanted to support our lord and savior, Trump, but I had to uninstall it. However, when I attempted to do this, my phone began to SCREAM at me, saying words like “Snowflake” and “Trump 2020”. It scared me half to death! Very bad app, had to get a new phone because it would not stop screaming at me.
attributes.title: Very stink app

attributes.review:
I was curious about what the president and his second term. I went on here to see how he is presenting himself. The app functions horribly. There is a major issue with an orange flashing screen that caused a major headache. I was hoping to maybe take a survey or two to see what they are trying to gather information on and found that the questions are so horribly biased that they are completely invalid. 
If I could rate lower I would.
attributes.title: Horrible experience! Do not download.

attributes.review: Hi there, I seem to dis like dis app bc it only shows how much he’s ripping families apart n black ppl being shot n how he is the best President, which I find isn’t all that true so um yea I don’t like this is it shows violence stuff n I’m jus not no I jus don’t wanna see this anymore it sad how he can jus sit there gettin more orange n more hair glue done to his body while sitting here watching America fall apart n not caring about anybody but his self and white ppl I said what I said #BLM not jus whites.
attributes.title: What I think should be said.

attributes.review: i downloaded the Official Trump 2020 app to see why i should vote for trump🟠 but as soon as i opened the app, it downloaded the coronavirus to my phone. i wasn’t sure what to do so i left it alone to see if it would go back to normal but then i hear a loud boom and go check on the phone. turns out it yelled “all lives matter” and proceeded to explode. i am absolutely revolted that it did that and now i have to live with the trauma i was just put through.
attributes.title: i am disgusted

attributes.review: This app is astronomical, why would people waist there time on this?! I came to support trump. But instead I get a terrible experience on the app. This is terrible and I hope that other customers don’t have to go through this. However the customers thought, this should not be on the App Store. It just is not a good app at all. I never hated something so much in my life. It has a horrible quality and it’s very laggy and ugh, it’s so bad. 👹💀☠️👽🤡😾🤢🤮🤕
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 💩

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in a way of trying to find a reason to maybe understand our ignorant, r_cist, homophobic, CHILD of a president. But just as i had suspected the apps content was filled with disturbing content and even had the "president" himselfs nudes leaked on HIS own app. Im in disgust but not only by what he cannot control on HIS app, but by how so many poor unfortunate souls support him. Please mR. pReSiDeNt, sit down. Change is coming in our favor. Weather you like it or not.❤️💝💞✨🥰🙈
attributes.title: 🧚🏼chair🧚🏼but make it ✨e l e c t r i c✨
